problems.title: Print Pairs with Sum
problems.description:
Print all pairs of elements whose sum equals a target number. Each pair should be printed as "(i, j)" where i and j are the elements. Print pairs in the order they appear (i from first occurrence, j from later occurrence). Each pair on a new line.

Input Format:
First line contains n, the size of array.
Second line contains n space-separated integers.
Third line contains target, the target sum.

Output Format:
Print pairs in format "(i, j)" each on a new line. If no pairs found, print nothing.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
5
1 2 3 4 5
7

Sample Output
(2, 5)
(3, 4)

Explanation:
Pairs with sum 7: (2, 5) and (3, 4).
hintsList: Use nested loops and check if arr[i] + arr[j] == target.
